node.title: “I’m Very Scared”: Oliver Stone Talks Snowden & Digital Security in BitTorrent Interview
node.excerpt: “Here’s why I make movies. I don’t like lies.” – Oliver Stone Over the course of a career that now stretches nearly as long as J.F.K’s life span, Oliver Stone has been relentlessly driven to make movies with real world impact, and his latest venture, Snowden, is a story for our times. node.title: Moby & The Void Pacific Choir Release Powerfully Human “These Systems Are Failing”

node.title: BitTorrent Now is Available on All Apple Platforms
node.excerpt: BitTorrent Now, our direct-to-fan streaming app, is now available on both Apple TV and iOS. For the first time, fans can stream music and film from independent artists to all their devices in the Apple ecosystem.
